interview.transcript:
Interviewer: Tell me about a conflict you resolved.
Candidate: We disagreed on the API design. I scheduled a meeting and we chose a hybrid approach.

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to resolve a conflict with a teammate.
questions.answer: We disagreed on the API design. I scheduled a meeting and we chose a hybrid approach.
improvements: Add more detail on the conflict and outcome
questions.sample_better_answer: At my last role, a teammate and I disagreed on REST vs GraphQL for a new feature. I scheduled a call, presented pros/cons for each, and we agreed on a hybrid: REST for reads, GraphQL for complex queries. We shipped on time and reduced backend complexity by 20%.

questions.question: Explain the difference between REST and GraphQL.
questions.answer: REST uses HTTP and URLs. GraphQL is differentâ€”you send a query. I think REST is simpler for basic stuff.
questions.improvement_quote: I think REST is simpler for basic stuff
